info.author: Adam Souzis
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Rx4RDF shields developers from the complexity of RDF by enabling you to
use familar XML technologies like XPath, XSLT and XUpdate to query, transform 
and manipulate RDF. Also included are two applications that utilize Rx4RDF:
Rhizome, a wiki-like content management and delivery system with wiki-like
markup languages for authoring XML and RDF, and RDFScribbler, for viewing and editing RDF models.
info.name: rx4rdf
info.summary: An application stack for building RDF-based applications and web sites
info.html_description: Rx4RDF shields developers from the complexity of RDF by enabling you to use familar XML technologies like XPath, XSLT and XUpdate to query, transform and manipulate RDF. Also included are two applications that utilize Rx4RDF: Rhizome, a wiki-like content management and delivery system with wiki-like markup languages for authoring XML and RDF, and RDFScribbler, for viewing and editing RDF models.
